resources.string: The Breathe activity allows you to watch calming videos (such as trees in the wind) with relaxing background noises (such as water flowing) in a random order.
The Fidget Cube activity allows you to play with a virtual fidget cube that has a switch, buttons, and a joystick accompanied by vibrations and clicking sounds.
The Bubbles activity allows you to pop colorful bubbles which slowly appear and move across the screen.
The Stories activity allows you to listen to popular children\'s stories (such as Goldilocks and the Three Bears) read soothingly with appropriate background imagery.
The Animals activity allows you to virtually pet animals (such as horses) who will respond with their respective animal call.
The Music activity allows you to select and listen to relaxing sounds on a loop.
